cardhead jeff plans has not been implemented by the council but i agree it should be.

Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:OOC: I had Kup fire on Empath? He shouldn't have. If I did post that then it was a mistake with names.

cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote: OOC: URGH!  What is it with people always having to blitz-post around 
here?  I thought there was an agreement to put a lid on it!  Maybe I 
should leave after all - certainly there's no shortage of other RPG's 
that actually respect members who can't be online 24-7!!!!!!

Empath/Wheeljack-X::

Having taken to the air to avoid Kup's fire earlier, Empath now lands 
right in his face.  "What's the big idea, Auto-bloke?  If I hadn't 
shorted out Teletran-1, it would've toasted you by now!  Or were you 
too busy shooting at me to notice it was shooting at you?"

"Hey, now, let's not go berserk over this," Wheeljack protests, 
pushing the two apart.
